metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7103 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in jQuery UI before 1.12.0 might allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the closeText parameter of the dialog function.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7103` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjs-jquery-ui - 1.12.1+dfsg-4
node-jquery-ui - 1.12.1+dfsg-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jqueryui package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.12.1+dfsg-4').
